articles.title: Marathoner Soh Rui Yong misses out on Asian Games as Singapore set to send its largest contingent - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: Singapore is set to send its largest contingent of 382 athletes to the upcoming 19th Asian Games, but without controversial marathoner Soh Rui Yong. 

The Singapore National Olympic Council (SNOC) said in a statement that it had "yet to find any …

articles.title: Space weather alert: Intense solar flare triggers radio blackout in Asia, Australia - DNA India
articles.description: The flare registered as an X1.1-class sun storm and lasted about 34 minutes, US Space Weather Prediction Center (SWPC) officials said.
articles.content:
The Sun has unleashed an intense solar flare, sparking radio blackouts in several parts of Asia and Australia.
According to the US Space Weather Prediction Center (SWPC), the solar flare peaked late… [+2648 chars]

articles.title: 'Be happy, Mummy': Benjamin Tan's mum dies, almost 2 years after falling into coma - AsiaOne
articles.description: Local actor Benjamin Tan's mother has died, close to two years after the 53-year-old first slipped into a coma. He paid tribute to his mum on his social media pages on Saturday (April 16). "I hope I made you proud in this life. I hope I can still be your son …
